short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive notifications in your browser whenever you have new messages to share on GaggleAMP.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GaggleAMP Chrome Extension is a popular add on for people who are Members of Gaggles. With it, you will be notified when new messages are available to share. This applications is FREE for existing Members of Gaggles. To get more information on GaggleAMP, please visit https://www.gaggleamp.com.
